mapper.select: SELECT a.hashId AS hashId FROM RoleCategoryAuthority ra,CategoryAuthority a WHERE ra.authorityId = a.id AND a.hashId IS NOT NULL AND ra.roleId IN ( SELECT utr.roleId FROM UserTenantRole utr WHERE utr.userId = #{userId} AND utr.tenantId = #{tenantId} ) UNION SELECT la.id AS hashId FROM RoleLinkAuthority rla,LinkAuthority la WHERE rla.authorityId = la.id AND rla.roleId IN ( SELECT utr.roleId FROM UserTenantRole utr WHERE utr.userId = #{userId} AND utr.tenantId = #{tenantId} ) UNION SELECT id AS hashId FROM CommonAuthority

SELECT ca.id FROM CategoryAuthority ca,RoleCategoryAuthority rca WHERE ca.id = rca.authorityId AND rca.roleId IN ( SELECT utr.roleId FROM UserTenantRole utr WHERE utr.userId = #{userId} AND utr.tenantId = #{tenantId} ) ORDER BY ca.pid,ca.orderIndex ASC
